description: Test hook that logs every tool execution to a text file. Creates a log file and appends tool names with timestamps.

.claude/hooks/tool-execution.log.content:
=== Claude Code Tool Execution Log ===
Created: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')

.claude/hooks/README-tool-logger.txt.content:
Tool Logger Hook
================

This hook logs every tool execution to tool-execution.log

The log file will contain:
- Timestamp of each tool execution
- Name of the tool that was executed

Log location: .claude/hooks/tool-execution.log

To view the log:
  cat .claude/hooks/tool-execution.log

To clear the log:
  echo "" > .claude/hooks/tool-execution.log
